Title: Designates payments made pursuant to payment in lieu of taxes agreements as "taxes or other lawful charges"
Summary: Designates payments made pursuant to payment in lieu of taxes agreements as "taxes or other lawful charges".
LawCode: Amd ยง858, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to designating payments made pursuant to payment in lieu of taxes agreements as "taxes or other lawful charges"
